Public MustInherit Class PropertyTab Implements IExtenderProvider
public ref class PropertyTab abstract : System::ComponentModel::IExtenderProvider

summary.span: 为属性选项卡提供基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for property tabs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供属性选项卡的基类行为。属性选项卡显示在属性窗口的 控件的工具栏上，并允许组件显示其属性或其他数据的不同视图。The class provides the base class behavior for a property tab. Property tabs are displayed on the toolbar of the control of the Properties window, and allow a component to display different views of its properties or other data. 用户代码通常不会直接创建 的实例。User code will usually not create an instance of a directly. 相反，指示要为组件显示的属性选项卡类型或属性选项卡的 可以与应为其显示 的属性关联。Instead, a that indicates the type of the property tab or property tabs to display for a component can be associated with the properties or types that the should be displayed for. 将实例化 指定的类型的 ，该类型与所浏览组件的类型或属性字段相关联。The will instantiate a of the type specified by a associated with the type or property field of the component that is being browsed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了一个示例， 列出了按类型名称排列的组件上的所有属性。The following code example provides an example that lists any properties on a component, arranged by type name. [!code-cpp[PropertyTabExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyTabExample/CPP/class1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PropertyTabExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyTabExample/CS/class1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PropertyTabExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PropertyTabExample/VB/class1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 释放由 占用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用 后，必须释放对 的所有引用，以便垃圾回收器可以回收 占用的内存。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

param.name: disposing
param.span: 如果为 ，则托管及非托管资源都释放；如果为 ，则仅释放非托管资源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放 使用的非托管资源并选择性地释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由 public `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用 `disposing` 设置为 `false`的 `Dispose`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 如果 `disposing` 参数为 true，则此方法将释放此 引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 重写时，请注意不要引用先前在调用 之前已释放的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现 的详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关 和 的详细信息，请参阅[清理非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).
